snippet: As vodka becomes more popular among American drinkers, new labels and flavors emerge and established labels change campaigns for existing products.
lead_paragraph: As vodka becomes more popular among American drinkers, new labels and flavors emerge and established labels change campaigns for existing products.

headline.main: In New Campaign, a Vodka Promotes ‘Balance’
headline.print_headline: In New Campaign, a Vodka Promotes ‘Balance’
headline.seo: Ultimat Vodka Promotes ‘Balance’ in New Campaign
